overview: Sofia is a lawyer specializing in intellectual property law. She has particular expertise in trademark law, IT law and copyright law. She has assisted Internet companies with various legal disputes, including, securing exclusive rights to their intangible assets. In addition to a law degree, Sofia holds a Bachelor of Commerce degree with an accounting major. Sofia is a “new mum” and has recently experienced the new-parent challenges of maneuvering in the jungle of the new and unknown. Her parenting experience has made her particularly interested in how technology can connect parents and facilitate the exchange of information, photos and experiences to make parenting more social.

degrees.subject: Law
degrees.institution: University of New South Wales, Australia
